text: Alice de Lencquesaing (born 11 August 1991) is a French actress who appeared in Mia Hansen-Løve's 2009 film Father of My Children with her father Louis-Do de Lencquesaing. She was also in the film Summer Hours. ==Filmography== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Year ! Title !
